health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about the Nakuru County Supplementary Appropriation Budget and reallocation of the County Department Budgets.
health_data_challenges: KRA demand notice, pending bills, low revenue collection
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. Focus on completing ongoing projects. 2. Prioritize and fast-track Ward Projects. 3. Undertake an economic analysis of projects. 4. Hasten procurement processes. 5. Formulate policies to address revenue shortfalls. 6. Ensure timely completion of projects to reduce rollover projects.
